page.title: 041THIS WAY HENRY.2orange ball
page.content: "This way Henry,that way Henry,this way Henry,all day long.Struts miss Lizy, struts miss Lizy,struts miss Lizy all day long.Here comes another one just like the other one,here comes another one all day long". You stand in two lines of six,or seven. One side is Henry and the other side is Lizy.You put your right and left arm in and out in time with the chant.The first "lizy" does a movement e.g.hop, (when the chant reaches"struts").First "Henry"has to copy.Game restarts with new first people. 2"orange balls, orange balls, here we go again last one to sit down".The last one to sit down goes in the middle of a circle.We whisper a boys name then we say stamp your feet if you hate him,fold your arms if you like him blow a kiss if you love him.Then we go back to a circle and start again.
